content: this quick crochet beanie uses the gorgeous and ultra soft knit picks billow cotton yarn for a quick light beanie you ll love how fun it is to create the basketweave look using post stitches and back loop only textures since this hat is so chunky it s sized just for adults it measures 20 at the brim which can comfortably fit anyone from teen 20 5 head to adult large 23 5 head without any adjustments
